Tues., Jan. 23: Stand with us to advance equity & justice!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

On Thursday, January 24, you have the opportunity to tell your elected officials how important it is to protect and expand the rights of all Mississippians. Join us for our fourth annual Legislative Advocacy Day.

Start the day learning about the legislative process, our legislative priorities and goals ahead of our news conference. Then help us defend civil liberties as you meet with legislators.

2019 Legislative Advocacy Day

Learn how you can protect civil rights and liberties in our state.

Thursday, January 24, 8 a.m. - 2 p.m.
ACLU of Mississippi Headquarters
233 E. Capitol St.
Jackson, MS 39201

RSVP BY EMAIL

We will provide all the tools you need to help us advocate for cash bail reform, statewide body camera guidelines for law enforcement agencies, online voter registration, no-excuse early voting, and civil rights for all Mississippians.

Read more about our 2019 Legislative Agenda and download our Lobbying Guide here.
